#summary How to start with the adcptools functions
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

ADCPtools is a set of functions to process ADCP data. The current functions are developed for RDI data formats.

Some of the concepts used in these functions are explained in more detail in the following publication:

Vermeulen1, B and Sassi, M.G. and Hoitink, A.J.F
Improved flow velocity estimates from moving-boat ADCP measurements
Water Resources Research
[http://dx.doi.org/10.1002/2013WR015152] Click here!
